title: akhilam ellAm
sahitya:
akhilam ellAm pugazh mahimai mighu muruganai anudinamum manamE ninaindu magizhAyO


anupallavi

  sakalamAna perum sankaTangaLumE akhila aruL Ananda svarUpanai


caraNam    anru avadiyuTra amarar tuNaivanAga ninru arattinai nilai pera sheidavani
inru ivvulagil tan anbarkkenrE kunru pala tulanga kuDi koNDiruppavanai
